description:
A PowerTransformerEnd is associated with each Terminal of a PowerTransformer.
The impedance values r, r0, x, and x0 of a PowerTransformerEnd represents a star equivalent as follows
1) for a two Terminal PowerTransformer the high voltage PowerTransformerEnd has non zero values on r, r0, x, and x0 while the low voltage PowerTransformerEnd has zero values for r, r0, x, and x0.
2) for a three Terminal PowerTransformer the three PowerTransformerEnds represents a star equivalent with each leg in the star represen

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_PowerTransformer
contents.description: The ends of this power transformer.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_b
contents.description: Magnetizing branch susceptance (B mag).  The value can be positive or negative.

enumValues.name: WindingConnection_Yn
enumValues.description: Wye, with neutral brought out for grounding.

enumValues.name: WindingConnection_Zn
enumValues.description: ZigZag, with neutral brought out for grounding.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_phaseAngleClock
contents.description: Terminal voltage phase angle displacement where 360 degrees are represented with clock hours. The valid values are 0 to 11. For example, for the secondary side end of a transformer with vector group code of 'Dyn11', specify the connection kind as wye with neutral and specify the phase angle of the clock as 11.  The clock value of the transformer end number specified as 1, is assumed to be zero.  Note the transformer end number is not assumed to be the same as the terminal sequence number.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_r
contents.description:
Resistance (star-model) of the transformer end.
The attribute shall be equal or greater than zero for non-equivalent transformers.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_r0
contents.description: Zero sequence series resistance (star-model) of the transformer end.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_ratedS
contents.description:
Normal apparent power rating.
The attribute shall be a positive value. For a two-winding transformer the values for the high and low voltage sides shall be identical.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_ratedU
contents.description:
Rated voltage: phase-phase for three-phase windings, and either phase-phase or phase-neutral for single-phase windings.
A high voltage side, as given by TransformerEnd.endNumber, shall have a ratedU that is greater or equal than ratedU for the lower voltage sides.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_x
contents.description: Positive sequence series reactance (star-model) of the transformer end.

contents.name: PowerTransformerEnd_x0
contents.description: Zero sequence series reactance of the transformer end.
